original: intros f g n x y H1 H2. unfold ex_diff_n in H1. unfold ex_diff_n. destruct H1 as [H1_1 H1_2]. split. - apply continuity_2d_pt_ext_loc with (g:=g) (x:=x) (y:=y); auto. - destruct n. + apply I. + destruct H1_2 as [H1_2_1 [H1_2_2 [H1_2_3 H1_2_4]]]. split. * apply is_derive_n_ext with (f:=fun z : R => f z y) (n:=n) (x:=x); auto. * split. ++ apply is_derive_n_ext with (f:=fun z : R => f x z) (n:=n) (x:=y); auto. ++ split. ** apply H1_2_3. ** apply H1_2_4.
